casebody.data:
Therese M. SEARS, Her Husband, Frank Sears Sr., and Her Daughter, Summer Sears
v.
Zachary AGURCIA, Mario Agurcia, Allstate Insurance Company, the State of Louisiana Through the Department of Safety and Corrections Office of State Police, and Louisiana State Trooper Sam Capaci NO. 2018-CC-1548 Supreme Court of Louisiana. January 8, 2019

Denied.
